content: oree shoth is blind but she can see the colours of magic no-nonsense and stubborn she s my favourite character in *broken kingdoms * the colours in hawthorne reminded me of the descriptions of magic in n k jemisin s books and this shawl was the result one skein of yarn will get you a decent scarflette while two will give you enough for a wrap hawthorne plumps up beautifully in the washer and dryer making this one of the easiest yarns to block **large ** hawthorne sport multi 500 yards 4 25mm hook **small ** hawthorne fingering 300 yards 3 75mm hook exact gauge is unimportant for this pattern
